list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a reflective surface, now typically of glass coated with a metal amalgam, that reflects a clear image.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he checked his appearance in the mirror
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã kiểm tra sự xuất hiện của anh ấy trong gương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a reflective surface) show a reflection of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the clear water mirrored the sky
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nước sạch sẽ nhân đôi bầu trời
